text: "There Goes My Baby" is a song by American singer Usher. It was written by James Scheffer, Frank Romano, Danny Morris, and Rico Love. It was produced by Love and Jim Jonsin. It was released as a promotional recording for Raymond v. Raymond (2010). It was released on February 9, 2010. The song won a Grammy Award for Best Male R&B; Vocal Performance, at the 53rd Grammy Awards in 2011. ==Track listing== *Digital download # "There Goes My Baby" - 4:44 ==Charts== Chart (2010) Peak position ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2010) Position U.S. Billboard'" Hot 100 83 U.S Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 2 U.S. Hot Radio Songs 45 == Release history == Country Date Format United States June 15, 2010 Rhythmic and urban airplay == References == Category:2010 songs Category:Usher songs
title: There Goes My Baby
